content.label: SECTION
content.heading: Introduction
copy: Redux is a JavaScript library to manage the state of your application - it helps you to manage the data you display and how you respond to user actions.
content.label: CODE/MARKUP
SECTION
content.heading: Install Redux
copy: Redux can be installed using NPM (Node Package Manager). Open the terminal and enter the following command to install Redux as a dependency of your project. You will require a package.json file.
content.label: CODE/MARKUP
SECTION
content.heading: Store
copy: The store is an object that holds the complete state of your application.
content.label: CODE/MARKUP
